html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10602023-10-26NRCAN
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisApproval of the designation by the Minister of Natural Resources of TRACY SLETTO of Calgary, Alberta, to be acting Chief Executive Officer of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure, on a full-time basis, for a term ending December 31, 2023, or until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 27, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the designation by the Minister of Natural Resources of TRACY SLETTO of Calgary, Alberta, to be acting Chief Executive Officer of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure, on a full-time basis, for a term ending December 31, 2023, or until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 27, 2023.
